cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.whatAreCookiesAnswer: Cookies are small text files that websites store on your device to remember information about you.
cookies.whatWeUseAnswer: We use only essential cookies required for the site to function:
cookies.authCookieDesc: Keeps you logged in between visits.
cookies.noThirdPartyAnswer: We do not use any third-party cookies, analytics, tracking, or advertising. Your data stays with us and is not shared with anyone.
cookies.localStorageAnswer: In addition to cookies, we store your preferences locally in your browser (localStorage). This data never leaves your device:
cookies.themeDesc: Your chosen color scheme (light, dark, or system)
cookies.clockFormatDesc: Your preferred time format (12h, 24h or system)
cookies.consentAnswer: By using this site, you agree to our use of essential cookies for authentication. Since we only use functional cookies that are strictly necessary for the site to work, no cookie banner is required under GDPR.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.whatIsThisAnswer1: Tierlist allows you to create structured tierlists where items can be ranked across multiple dimensions:
faq.templatesDesc: Create reusable tierlist templates with custom tiers (rows), categories (columns), and cards (items)
faq.rankingsDesc: Fill out templates by dragging cards into cells to create your personal tierlist
faq.sharingDesc: Share your tierlists with view-only or editable links, allowing others to see or collaborate on tierlists
faq.howToUse: How do I use this site?
faq.step1Desc: Start by creating a new template with your desired tiers, columns, and cards
faq.step2Desc: Click "Start Tierlist" on any template to create your personal tierlist
faq.step3Desc: Drag cards from the unranked area into the grid cells to rank them
faq.step4Desc: Use the Share button to get links for others to view or edit your tierlist
